title: LF Team for new Season
body:
Good Evening Summoners,

first I want to say , I know my english isn't the best , it's not my mainlanguage.
But i think i can communicate with teammates via Chat or Voice :)

Now what am I looking for? To be honest - it's written in the topic.

I am looking for a Team ( it doesn't matter if it's a new Team or Team with a huge mount of knowledge)

Let me introduce myself :
- I am 22 years old
- living in Germany 
- playing LoL since Season 2 ( with a few breaks)
- My highest rank was Gold in 2014
- I think I can say , that I am a quiet person . I don't rage about  faults by my team - but sometimes i rage about my own mistakes , 'cause i think i am hella dumb! :D

In 2014 i carried myself from B to gold ( as Support ) 
That's how it comes to my most played lanes : Mid / Support and ADC ( in this order)

The sad thing is since 2015 I am silver ranked.


If you are interested , add me Ingame. My Nickname is : Canikz 

See u soon in Summoners Rift!{{champion:84}}

replies.body:
Warum postest du denn deinen englischen Thread im Deutschen Forum? :S

Wir verstehen dich auch in deiner Muttersprache!(sofern diese Deutsch ist)
oh oups :D Ich bin das irgendwie gewohnt dass es international ist . sorry :)
